visuals.description: EXTREME CLOSE-UP: A pair of visibly thin, worn, light grey socks on shivering feet. Goosebumps are pronounced on the skin. The feet are held precariously over a single, tiny, sputtering birthday candle flame, which looks comically ineffective. A faint, 'cold' steam rises from the feet, emphasizing extreme chill.

WIDER SHOT: Reveal 'BERTRAM' (a man in his 40s, dressed in an absurd number of mismatched, thick layers, a ridiculously large scarf, and a ski hat indoors) shivering uncontrollably on a saggy armchair in a dimly lit, drafty living room. He holds his feet awkwardly over the pitiful candle, his expression a theatrical mix of profound misery and desperate, futile hope. His breath is visibly condensing in the cold air.

CLOSE-UP: Bertram's face as he lets out a dramatic, elongated 'BRRRRRR...' A tiny, comical icicle forms on the tip of his nose. A cartoonish thought bubble pops up beside his head, featuring an exaggerated, forlorn question mark.

audio.description: Faint, dramatic 'shiver' sound effects. Tiny, sad 'flicker' of the candle. A subtle, high-pitched whine of cold.
Loud teeth chattering. Low, sustained 'brrrrrr...' from Bertram. Faint, mournful wind howling outside.
Exaggerated 'BRRRRR...' sound. Cartoon 'POP!' for the thought bubble. A final, pathetic shiver.

visuals.description: SMOOTH DISSOLVE from Scene 1's misery to a warm, inviting glow. Bertram's feet are now clad in plush, vibrant LordSocks (one cream, one forest_green, showcasing the rich colors and soft wool blend). The feet are elevated on a luxurious, velvet cushion. Bertram's toes wiggle slowly and exquisitely, as if experiencing pure bliss. A soft, warm, almost ethereal light emanates from his feet, signifying ultimate warmth.

WIDER SHOT: Bertram is no longer shivering. He is sprawled regally on the armchair, completely relaxed, eyes closed, a beatific, almost spiritual smile on his face. He's now comically wearing only a luxurious silk robe and a laurel wreath, despite the implied continued 'winter' outside. The room is brightly lit, undeniably cozy, with a roaring fireplace in the background. His hand lazily gestures a 'dismissal' of all past suffering. Other LordSocks colors (burgundy, charcoal) are neatly folded on a side table nearby, looking incredibly inviting.

EXTREME CLOSE-UP on one of the LordSocks (e.g., the charcoal one), showcasing its plush cushioning and thermal texture. A tiny, almost imperceptible 'poof' of warm, contented air wafts from the sock. SUPERIMPOSED TEXT appears: 'LordSocks. Winter's Warmest Hug. Unrivaled Comfort.'

audio.description: Gentle, blissful harp glissando. Soft, satisfied 'Mmmmmm...' from Bertram. A subtle 'whoosh' as warmth envelops him.
Warm, comforting classical music swells slightly. A subtle, almost heavenly choir hums. Sound of plush fabric rustling softly as Bertram relaxes.
Luxurious 'sigh' sound effect. A final, gentle chime. A confident, warm male voiceover: 'LordSocks. Conquer cold. Embrace true comfort.'
